text: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā
edit: Tatra kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi – dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā

translations.transtext: In that place, the Blessed One called the group of five monks. "These two extremes, monks, should not be practiced by a renouncer."
